comments.raw_text:
User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:7.0.1) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/7.0.1
Build ID: 20110928134238

Steps to reproduce:

Nothing out of the ordinary, it occurs on every page I have visited and nothing in particular appears to have triggered it. It doesn't appear to be triggered by downloads, high speed games, chats, or any particular site. 


Actual results:

Firefox will sporadically freeze up on me and "Not respond" for a short span of time. Usually about 5-10 seconds and then it "responds" and everything works fine. It never completely crashes which I am glad of but it is annoying enough to where I have considered downloading an earlier version or just using Internet Explorer till it stops freezing.


Expected results:

Well it shouldn't have frozen. The sites should have worked just fine and there shouldn't have been any issues with it "not responding".

comments.text: What are the intervals between the freezes? Does it also happen on Firefox 8?
